welcome_message_body: Welcome to Melrose Park, the charming city known for its picturesque parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful time in Melrose Park!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving Delta Air Lines and its SkyTeam partners, as well as select international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Home to American Airlines and its oneworld partners, as well as a few other domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at O'hare, serving various airlines from around the world.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for purchase.
Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport provides services for both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to executive and private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
